divs: Sighting DetailsI and a friend were waiting on a tennis court in the Wood Ranch Park for two other players to show up. The lights had not yet warmed up enough to come on. These objects caught my attention as they traveled through the sky. I thought they were balls of light. These were round balls of white light moving through the atmosphere quickley but smoothly. I was completely amazed to witness these luminous spheres traveling before my eyes. I told my friend dennis to look quick look at that and they were gone. They just disappeared.
Summary: Approximately seven to nine white round ball shaped spheres traveled through the sky for abour 7 seconds and they were gone.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Simi Valley
There were no other sightings in Simi Valley on or around March 2nd 2006
